Add a two custom fields, in this case 'Hardware Version' and 'Software Version'
Set these new custom fields to be mandatory at bug creation
Try to file a new bug.


Actual results:

The field shows correctly in the new bug entry window,
A star is shown correctly to show that the values are mandatory
The text background is white

The text background should be yellow like the other mandatory fields.

comments.text:
Comment on attachment 690918
Patch-v4

>=== modified file 'template/en/default/bug/create/create.html.tmpl'

>+      <select name="version" id="version" size="5" class="required">

You should also add aria-required="true" for consistency.



>=== modified file 'template/en/default/bug/field.html.tmpl'

>                     size="[% field_size FILTER html %]" multiple="multiple"
>                     [% ' aria-required="true"' IF field.is_mandatory %]
>                 [% END %]
>+                [% ' class="required"' IF field.is_mandatory %]

Does it make sense to specify this class for single-select fields? If yes, then aria-required="true" should be moved there too. In all cases, they must stay grouped together.



>=== modified file 'template/en/default/global/textarea.html.tmpl'

>+            aria-required="true" class="required"

The class attribute is already set. You are not allowed to duplicate attributes. This is invalid HTML4.
